name: Initial D: Street Stage
overview: Initial D Street Stage is a PSP-exclusive game based on Initial D Arcade Stage Ver.3. This game features Dogfight by M.o.v.e. as it's intro theme which also used as the first opening theme of Initial D Fourth Stage. The legend of the street mode which against the rival characters are exactly the same as the arcade game but no Akina Snow or against Miki Senpai.
